languages.text: Арбитр выбирает клетку в радиусе 6 клеток от себя. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от арбитра совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}. При провале они немедленно перемещаются в указанную клетку, если это возможно.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

traits.locale_text: Арбитр выбирает клетку в радиусе 6 клеток от себя. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от арбитра совершают проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}. При провале они немедленно перемещаются в указанную клетку, если это возможно.

Арбитр выбирает клетку в радиусе 6 клеток от себя. Все противники в радиусе 3 клеток от арбитра совершают проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}. При провале они немедленно перемещаются в указанную клетку, если это возможно.

languages.text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a Willpower resistance test with a penalty of -{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a Willpower resistance test with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} penalty. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

languages.text: Yargıcı, 6 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir hücreyi seçer. Yargıcı'nın etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar, −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Başarısız bir testte, mümkünse, belirlenen hücreye anında ilerlerler.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı, 6 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir hücreyi seçer. Yargıcı'nın etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar, −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} ceza puanına sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Başarısız bir testte, mümkünse, belirlenen hücreye anında ilerlerler.

Yargıcı, 6 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir hücreyi seçer. Yargıcı'nın etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar, −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Başarısız bir testte, mümkünse, belirlenen hücreye anında ilerlerler.

languages.text: El Arbitrator escoge una casilla situada en un radio de 6 casillas. Todos los enemigos que estén en un radio de 3 casillas en torno al Arbitrator deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}. Si fallan esta prueba, se mueven inmediatamente a la casilla designada (si es posible).
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

traits.locale_text: El Arbitrator escoge una casilla situada en un radio de 6 casillas. Todos los enemigos que estén en un radio de 3 casillas en torno al Arbitrator deben realizar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}. Si fallan esta prueba, se mueven inmediatamente a la casilla designada (si es posible).

El Arbitrator escoge una casilla situada en un radio de 6 casillas. Todos los enemigos que estén en un radio de 3 casillas en torno al Arbitrator deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}. Si fallan esta prueba, se mueven inmediatamente a la casilla designada (si es posible).

languages.text: 法务官选择距离6格以内的任意格子，随后，距离法务官3格以内的所有敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。未能通过检定的敌人会在可能的情况下，立刻移动至指定的格子处。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

traits.locale_text: 法务官选择距离6格以内的任意格子，随后，距离法务官3格以内的所有敌人都需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}减值。未能通过检定的敌人会在可能的情况下，立刻移动至指定的格子处。

languages.text: L'arbitrator sélectionne une cellule dans un rayon de 6 cases. Tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de l'arbitrator doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}, sans quoi ils se placent immédiatement sur la case désignée, si possible.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

traits.locale_text: L'arbitrator sélectionne une cellule dans un rayon de 6 cases. Tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de l'arbitrator doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}, sans quoi ils se placent immédiatement sur la case désignée, si possible.

languages.text: アービトレイターは半径6セル以内のセルを1つ選択する。アービトレイターの半径3セル以内のすべての敵は、-{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗すると、該当する場合は、指定されたセルへ即座に移動される。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターは半径6セル以内のセルを1つ選択する。アービトレイターの半径3セル以内のすべての敵は、-{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa}のペナルティで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。失敗すると、該当する場合は、指定されたセルへ即座に移動される。

languages.text: Der Arbitrator wählt ein Feld in einem Radius von 6 Feldern aus. Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um den Arbitrator müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} bestehen. Missling die Probe, gehen sie umgehend auf das gewählte Feld.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator chooses a cell within a 6-cell radius. All enemies within a 3-cell radius around the Arbitrator must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. On a failed test, if possible, they immediately move to the designated cell.

traits.locale_text: Der Arbitrator wählt ein Feld in einem Radius von 6 Feldern aus. Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um den Arbitrator müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} bestehen. Missling die Probe, gehen sie umgehend auf das gewählte Feld.

Der Arbitrator wählt ein Feld in einem Radius von 6 Feldern aus. Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 3 Feldern um den Arbitrator müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -{uip|Damage|b6e6d67ba6cb4fae9bd717b1b05b15fa} bestehen. Missling die Probe, gehen sie umgehend auf das gewählte Feld.
